topics.body:
Wow; I've read the dumbest fucking thing I've read the entire month.  China is creating manmade islands to expand their territory.

The reason why it's so fucking stupid is think about how much manmade islands cost to make.



And in other stupidity:
ISIS is taxing the regions they control to fucking death.  The reason why they're continuing to gain ground is that their tax rates are like 50% of income.  The reason why eventually the areas they control are going to collapse is that the economy in the areas they control are collapsing.

Essentially ISIS might continue to gain control of areas in Iraq, but on the other hand in ten years the areas they control and syria will be completely collapse economically and be just utter anarchy.  ISIS probably will continue to exist, but it will probably be another Somalia situation where the country is pretty much just anarchy.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555d1ddf636872061bf70c00#post_555d1ddf636872061bf70c00
The reason why they're fucked in the long run is they don't have a long term stable economy and now that factories are leaving china they're pretty fucked in the long run.  Mainland china was never going to go anywhere.  The only reason why they became that powerful economically and military wise is because their economy was growing because of industrialization.

What is probably going to happen in 15-20 years is China has no money cause the people currently in charge are fucking idiots that are wasting their money instead of creating a stable economy.

Tl:dr; the people currently running mainland China are fucking idiots.
